QuestData.Title: Riverbeast Training: Bulbapore
QuestData.Description: In the far south, in the Spires of Arak, the land is being swallowed by the mushrooms that grow underwater, and strange fungal creatures grow uninhibited.$B$BTaking on a strange creature, like the fungal giant Bulbapore, will grant you a chance to expose your mount to unfamiliar predators.
QuestData.LogDescription: Defeat Bulbapore while riding your Riverbeast-In-Training.
